content: उद्वृत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Raised, elevated (स्तन, दंत, मेघ &c.). {@--2@} Flowing out, not contained in, swollen, overflowing; हृदयभरितोद्वृत्तविस्मय <ls>Māl. 4</ls>; अपामुद्वृत्तानां <ls>Mu. 3. 8</ls> overflowing; उद्वृतः क इव सुखावहः परेषां <ls>Śi. 8. 18.</ls> (where उ° means also ‘gone astray, ill-behaved’). {@--3@} Grown, increased. {@--4@} Exalted, prosperous. {@--5@} Proud, furious, haughty; °मृगपति <ls>K. 90.</ls> {@--6@} Vomited up. {@--7@} Left as a remainder. {@--8@} Ill-conducted, ill-mannered, rude. {@--9@} Agitated; उद्वृत्तनक्रात् सहसोन्ममज्ज <ls>R. 16. 79.</ls>
